hero.title: Protecting Vietnam's Wildlife
hero.subtitle: Join us in conserving endangered species and preserving biodiversity for future generations
hero.legal: Vietnam's 2017 Penal Code: Up to 15 years imprisonment for wildlife crimes

mission.title: Our Conservation Mission
mission.subtitle: Protecting Vietnam's rich biodiversity through education, enforcement, and community engagement

protect.title: Protect Wildlife, Preserve Our Future
protect.description: Every action we take today shapes the world we leave for tomorrow. Vietnam's wildlife needs our protection now.

educate.title: Education & Awareness
educate.description: Building understanding and respect for Vietnam's unique biodiversity through community programs.

enforce.title: Law Enforcement Support
enforce.description: Working with authorities to combat illegal wildlife trade and habitat destruction.

community.title: Community Engagement
community.description: Empowering local communities to become guardians of their natural heritage.

species.errorLoading: Error loading species data. Please try again.

reporting.title: Report Wildlife Crime
reporting.subtitle: Help protect Vietnam's wildlife by reporting illegal activities

form.title: Submit a Report
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide detailed description of the incident
form.evidenceHelp: Upload photos, videos, or documents (Max 10MB each)
form.contactPlaceholder: Your phone or email for follow-up
form.legal: Legal Notice: False reports may result in legal consequences under Vietnamese law.

conservation.title: Conservation Impact in Vietnam
conservation.subtitle: Real progress in protecting Vietnam's biodiversity

recentWins.pangolin: Successful pangolin rescue operation in Ha Long Bay
recentWins.patrol: Anti-poaching patrol prevented 12 illegal hunting attempts
recentWins.habitat: New 2,500-hectare protected area established in Central Highlands

cta.subtitle: Every action counts in protecting Vietnam's precious wildlife
